item.title: Startupvn
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: [startup.vn](http://startup.vn/) was founded 10 years ago, when the concept of "startups" was still fairly new in Vietnam. A handful of people from diverse backgrounds joined hands to create a homeland for Vietnamese who aim at building and growing their own businesses. ðŸ’¡ Fostering innovation and entrepreneurship in Vietnam since 2011. What started out as a weekend passion project quickly progressed into a strong, proud, aspiring community. 10 years in, startup.
